alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Henry (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 5:17PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Defiance, northern Putnam, central Paulding, Henry and southeastern Fulton Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 517 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Archbold to near Defiance to near Payne. Movement was east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Defiance, Napoleon, Paulding, Leipsic, Deshler, Payne, Liberty Center, Continental, Holgate, Mcclure, Hamler, Texas, Melrose, Malinta, Florida, West Leipsic, Latty, Belmore, Miller City and Broughton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northwestern and west central Ohio.
